topic.description: The name of the Kafka topic to consume data from

dataFormat.description: A string defining the data format for the data encoded in Kafka

bootstrapServers.description: The IP addresses and ports for the bootstrap servers in your Kafka cluster.

schema.description: A JSON string describing the schema of the messages in Kafka. Mutually exclusive with schemaRegistry parameter. For AVRO format, a valid AVRO schema must be provided.

schemaRegistry.description: The address to the Confluent Schema Registry to use to get schema information for this Kafka instance. Mutually exclusive with schema parameter.

autoOffsetResetConfig.description: The offset where we can start consuming data. Options: earliest, latest.

consumerConfigUpdates.description: A map of Kafka Consumer Config Updates (see https://docs.confluent.io/platform/current/installation/configuration/consumer-configs.html)

table.description: The name of the BigQuery table to read from. Format: "[project:]dataset.table"

createDisposition.description: Create disposition for the BigQuery table. Default: CREATE_IF_NECESSARY.

writeDisposition.description: Write disposition for the BigQuery table. Default: WRITE_APPEND.
